attributes.action: Take Clostridium difficile seriously and demand to know what you intend to do to address it
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
We the undersigned have all been affected by Clostridium difficile and are appalled that there is not enough being done to eradicate this bug from our hospitals and that treatment of us and our loved ones affected by it is far from consistent and in some cases even inadequate.

Cases of Clostridium difficle are increasing every year. We need this reversed.

On behalf of all of us, we urge you to take Clostridium difficile seriously and demand to know what you intend to do to address it.

government_responses.details:
